text: Philippe Couillard (; born June 26, 1957) is a Canadian politician. He was the 31st Premier of Quebec from 2014 until his defeat in 2018. He is the leader of the Quebec Liberal Party and a former university professor and neurosurgeon in Quebec, Canada. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Montreal Category:Premiers of Quebec Category:Privy Councillors (Canada) Category:Neurosurgeons
title: Philippe Couillard
